title: Update protobuf API usage (RepeatedField -> Vec, getter changes)
description: Why: protobuf 3.x removed RepeatedField, changed getter prefixes. Done when: all src files use Vec and new getter names.
close_reason: Updated protobuf API: RepeatedField->Vec, MessageFull trait, direct field access

title: Update goauth API (get_token_with_creds -> get_token_blocking)
description: Why: goauth 0.17 renamed token retrieval function. Done when: utils.rs uses get_token_blocking or async get_token.

title: Replace rustc-serialize with base64 crate
description: Why: rustc-serialize is deprecated. Done when: base64 encoding uses base64 crate, rustc-serialize removed from deps.

title: Update build.rs for protobuf-codegen 3.x
description: Why: protobuf-codegen-pure merged into protobuf-codegen with new API. Done when: build.rs uses Codegen::new() API and compiles.
close_reason: Updated build.rs to use protobuf-codegen 3.x API, created src/protos.rs to include generated files

title: Build and fix all compilation errors
description: Why: After dependency updates, need to verify everything compiles. Done when: cargo build succeeds with no errors.
close_reason: Build successful, all compilation errors fixed

title: Update Cargo.toml dependencies to latest versions
description: Why: Dependencies are outdated (protobuf 2.x, goauth 0.6, etc). Done when: Cargo.toml has all updated dependency versions.
close_reason: Cargo.toml updated with new dependency versions

title: Replace protobuf-json-temp with protobuf-json-mapping
description: Why: protobuf-json-temp is unmaintained and incompatible with protobuf 3.x. Done when: request.rs uses print_to_string() from protobuf-json-mapping.

title: Update proto files and add support for newer Bigtable API methods
description: Why: Proto files are outdated, missing PingAndWarm, PrepareQuery, ExecuteQuery, GenerateInitialChangeStreamPartitions, ReadChangeStream. Done when: Proto files updated from googleapis, new methods added to method.rs, builds successfully.
close_reason: Updated proto files from googleapis, added 5 new methods: PingAndWarm, GenerateInitialChangeStreamPartitions, ReadChangeStream, PrepareQuery, ExecuteQuery
